Capitalize.definition: to convert into capital [ the company's earnings] b

1 a.definition: to convert into capital [ the company's earnings]

sub_terms.b: to treat as a capital expenditure rather than an ordinary and necessary expense [the cost of the merger must be]

2 a.definition: to compute the present value of (an income extended over a period of time) compare

sub_terms.b: to convert (a periodic payment) into an equivalent capital sum [annuities]

3.definition: to supply capital for [hadthe business with her own savings]
3.capitalized: the business with her own savings]
